
# snippets

- html css js snippets
- run, edit, share
- mobile friendly
- offline webapp
- ~~loading~~
- ~~account~~
- ~~cookies~~
- ~~database~~

[demo](https://nicopowa.github.io/snippets/#H4sIAAAAAAAAClWPwQqDMBBEf6XMqYWlhx63n2I8WN0a7SYpSURE/PeitgVvwzxmZndGBsOKajiNIWoDQgTP8JUTMPoEQp7eq46DB8FK19oMvhEeoZnAz0qTEOrgU1AB5zgIofNJYv7TPoGLklCnr9DOv8AFbHaK3S8Xgmt2vNnHxFbxm7lqaM9mP9zgcjf+CLZfVoBy+QBi66S85AAAAA==)

## data

- no server involved
- local storage
	- be careful when clearing browser data
	- open menu and dump to export backup
- url hash
	- click share and keep url
	- use url shortener service


## exec

- first js block = main (entry point, cannot be deleted) = runs last
- load external js and css from md block

	```
	@js https://url.to/script.js
	@css https://url.to/style.css
	```

## shortcuts

- ctrl+r = run
- ctrl+s = save


## examples

- [sudoku](https://nicopowa.github.io/snippets/#)
- [threejs](https://nicopowa.github.io/snippets/#)
- [rainbow](https://nicopowa.github.io/snippets/#)
- [droplets](https://code.nicopowa.com/#)


## dependencies

- [codemirror](https://codemirror.net/)
- [closure compiler](https://github.com/google/closure-compiler)
- [sass](https://github.com/sass/sass)
